title: "Quantum computing infrastructure software startup Q-CTRL raises $27.4M"
excerpt: "Q-CTRL is an Australian startup that’s hoping to tackle the problem of reliability in quantum computing. Rather than build quantum computers itself, it makes software that’s used to stabilize the quantum machines built by other companies."
